Grayscale has registered Delaware trusts tied to potential  $BNB and  $HYPE exchange-traded products, a preliminary step that often precedes formal ETF or ETP filings. While this move does not confirm that such products will be launched, it indicates Grayscale‚Äôs intent to explore regulated investment exposure to these assets as part of its broader digital asset strategy.
The development reflects ongoing institutional interest in expanding crypto-related financial products amid evolving regulatory conditions. As investors increasingly seek diversified and regulated access to digital assets, Grayscale‚Äôs action highlights the continued maturation of the market and may signal similar exploratory steps by other asset managers in the months ahead.

$HYPE is showing signs of stabilization after a prolonged downtrend. Price has reached a strong support zone where accumulation is visible and structure is starting to build.


If this area holds, a break above the descending trendline could trigger a bullish recovery toward higher resistance levels. Losing this support would increase downside pressure.

Trading pair: $HYPE / $USDT


Chart Overview:
The price of $HYPE is at an important level of $24. If the price reacts to this level during its movement, an upward movement will begin.


Entry Zone:
A long position can be opened near the $24 level.


Main Target:
Liquidity is at the previous high of $28.40.
